articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The Crime and Policing Bill puts a new duty on teachers, GPs, and other professionals to report concerns or face criminal sanctions.
articles.title: 'Romeo and Juliet' clause exempts teachers reporting consensual teen sex

articles.description: The temporary measure by the government is aimed at stopping the spread of foot and mouth disease.
articles.title: UK ban on EU cheese and meat: What it means for you

articles.description: The chief executive of the company which felled an ancient oak apologises and opens a review.
articles.title: Toby Carvery owner 'sorry' for felling ancient Enfield tree

articles.description: The president of the Board of Deputies says he disagrees with the letter criticising the war in Gaza.
articles.title: Head of British Jewish body criticises members' open letter attack on Israel

articles.description: Hundreds of contacts were mistakenly added to a group set up to promote the Tory MP's marathon run.
articles.title: Robert Jenrick adds hundreds of contacts to WhatsApp group in mix-up

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Public bodies will have to review policies after the Supreme Court's ruling a woman is based on biological sex.
articles.title: Equalities watchdog to issue new guidelines on gender after ruling

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The US president says Jerome Powell's "termination" as central bank chair "cannot come fast enough!"
articles.title: Donald Trump attacks Fed boss for not cutting interest rates

articles.title: The truth about life on other planets and what it means for Earth

articles.description: Trevor Greenfield and his wife, Eileen,  were among the group of passengers stranded at Swindon.
articles.title: Welsh couple stranded after being let off packed GWR train for air

articles.description: The showrunner says he has "no time" for complaints about diversity from "online warriors".
